name: Perfumed Soap - CHEROKEE RIDGE
description:
CHEROKEE RIDGE
Atop a plateau, a lone native searches the horizon.
Notes of cedarwood and navel orange

The proprietary PIGASUS soap recipe contains a 100% vegetable oil blend.
Each bar is cut by hand, then wrapped in vellum textured French paper and graffiti embellished washi tape from Japan.

Ingredient List/ 
Purified water from the Rocky Mountains, Olive oil, Coconut oil, Palm kernel oil, Castor oil, Sodium hydroxide, Cocoa butter, Essential oils, Vitamin e oil

Net Weight/ 
4 oz 
(Size varies as each bar is cut by hand. 4 oz is the minimum weight)

Handcrafted in CO, USA
